Events that occurred on 26 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Paula Coston.
1970 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 315a.
1974 - Mythcon 5 at Scripps College in Claremont, California.
1977 - Mythcon 8 at University of San Diego, California.
2003 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is released on DVD and VHS.
2013 - Narrator Gerard Murphy dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
